list.name: Bear
list.description: A large bear appears from behind the rocks, then growls at you. It looks emaciated, but still dangerous.

list.name: Snake
list.description: You step over a small snake on the trail, it slithers away once spooked.

list.name: Panther
list.description: The strong panther is crouched in the tall grass waiting for you to pass.

list.name: Spider
list.description: The poisonous spider hangs form its web ready to strike with its large fangs.

list.name: Manticore
list.description: The manticore rushes at you with its sword and shield drawled.

list.name: Hydra
list.description: The six headed hydra breaths fire over the cliff warning all passing adventurers to stay away.

list.name: Rat
list.description: You wake up a nest of large red eyed rats.

list.name: Troll
list.description: You spot a huge troll near the bridge. It's several meters high, and has a large wooden club big enough to crush you.

list.name: Dragon
list.description: A magnificent wild dragon flies just above you and lands dangerously close. It is bright red, and its eyes are glowing yellow.

list.name: Sheep
list.description: A brown woolly sheep passes by, it doesn't seem to be much of a treat.

list.name: Wolf
list.description: A feral wolf walks by and looks in your direction, it looks menacing. It seems hungry, but not desperate.

list.name: Bunny
list.description: A cute white bunny jumps out of the bushes, it looks fluffy and soft, pretty much inoffensive.

list.name: Imp
list.description: A small flying imp has spotted you and is starting to cast an illusion spell over you.

list.name: Goblin
list.description: There is a group of small green goblins resting by a fire eating their last prey.

list.name: Minotaur
list.description: You see a strong minotaur gripping its spear as it gallops through the filed ahead.

list.name: Griffin
list.description: A massive feathered griffin circles in the sky looking for its next prey.

list.name: Basilisk
list.description: A scaled basilisk rushes out of the water and snaps it giant jaws at you.

list.name: Zombie
list.description: A hoard of bloody zombies are waking down the dark ally.

list.name: Ghoul
list.description: The ghoul howls in the night as it floats over the old graveyard.

list.name: Banshee
list.description: A screaming banshee has emerged form the desecrated crypt.

list.name: Golem
list.description: the large rock golem stands guard in front of the ornate golden door.

list.name: Ghost
list.description: the white ghost floats our from the broken nearby grave.

list.name: Cat
list.description: A stray black cat is sitting in a tree watching your every move.

list.name: Tiger
list.description: You cross a sleeping tiger in the meadow.

list.name: donkey
list.description: The grey donkey bucks its hind legs at you keeping you away.

list.name: Demon God
list.description: The dark demon god begins his descent onto the unknowing party.
